person.persName: John A. Bogie (Bath County, Kentucky, manufacturer and farmer.)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, manufacturer and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Arabella S. Bogie. Father of James S. Bogie. Manufacturer in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned sixteen enslaved persons in Bath County in 1860. Farmer in Bath County in 1863.
